replies.body: When is the expected release date for the Practice Tool?
Is there an option to have unlimited charges on wards (but still keep max wards placed on map)? I think thats a must for practising ward spots and insecs :)
bump
so with the ability reset button, will we have to always click reset on it or will it be a toggle? Also will there be bots in it?
You'll be able to add 1 bot to the enemy team from our list of currently available bots. I might make sense to allow up to 5 bots on the enemy team, but we've set it to 1 for now.
Would we be able to set the bots to only move around in lane so say we want to practice our hooks with Blitz,Thresh and Nautilus
I'd also like to know
Will you be able to practise with another player?
It's a single-player tool. We've focused on something for players to practice their champion mechanics, how to jungle, etc.

Hi Maraudaur, something my mate and I do regularly is spar certain matchups, we love the concept of freezing a level and trying out a lvl 2 or lvl 3 all in against each other whilst being able to reset our positions straight after to repeat the engage over and over. Perhaps this is something you could introduce at a later stage? I would consider this to still be champion mechanics, as you are working around the enemy mechanics with your own. It would be a good tool to test counters and playing around or into them.
Its definitely something we are thinking about. But no promises. When there are updates to the tool we will definitely let you know through articles and patch notes.
{{champion:33}}
YAY FINALLY THIS IS OUT !!!!!!!
Its Not dude
YAY FINALLY THIS IS NEARLY OUT !!!!!!!
its out
YOU'RE OUT (rekt him)
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
will you be able to change your current champ while in practice mode
This actually sounds like a great idea. At least to be able to pick a pool of champions and cycle between them would save a lot of time.

Hey Marauder, I'd recommend implementing some sort of skill shot practice (lets face it, even "intermediate" bots dont really sidestep like humans). Having the Bot movement more random would be really great for practicing.

I'd be interested in having a bot (or dummy) that all it does is moves around, then tries to avoid skillshots

Maybe have it invincible, and when you hit it, it flashes a certain colour. Example, red for hit, green for critical hit (like the center of Zigg's ult) and blue for extra effects (like Brand's attacks)
it said it was on live servers but i cant access it? im OCE
Can we get hotkeys instead of always having to manually click on what we want?

If you look at the last gif you can see the commands are binded to hotkeys

Edit: actually all the gifs show this
Cheers man my map awareness is trash to
i have been waiting for this for ages, good work riot!
how do i get into practice tool!!!!!{{item:2010}} {{champion:136}}
where do you go to access this?
will you be able to try out skins in this practice tool much like dota 2's?
Thank you so much Riot! I have been waiting for this feature ever since I started playing and I'm so happy that it's finally coming out.

So to add to the functions for map familiarity i would be interested to be able to play around with what the enemy can see on the map, so we could practice avoiding wards, seeing when crab or minions will see us. Food for thought.
Dear Riot, Is it possible to reduce attack damage below base value with this tool? I would like to practice last hitting with about 25 AD instead of the normal 50+
Thank you!! Really looking fwd to this!
Super excited for this, thanks.
I guessing OCE will be last to get this :(
Having the option to change, or at least cycle through, runes and masteries in-game would be great.
Maybe you could add a respawn button for baron?
WHERE IS THE TRAINING MODE IN 7.2!?! {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

What I would like to see is something along the lines of quick-switching available champions, or adding in an AI/Bot of some difficulty (Have the standard difficulties first and maybe enable the Doom Bot difficulty later on). On top of this, give commands that will allow certain rotating game-mode things to be implemented (however upon re-reading I realised auto-refresh CD's is basically URF mode so good job)
Aye now i can practice directional kick flashes :) Finally!!!

Is there any potential for commands to manipulate bot behaviour/movement? 

Thanks
I have a feeling this will be a 'later added' thing rather than on-release feature, they said they would continue to evolve the practice tool

On the topic of leveling up and locking level, could you please consider allowing leveling down to save us having to reset the whole game? Unless it was already stated you would and i didn't see it, thanks :)
can we use these tool to practice with other players??
this looks really cool
Hey looking good just thinking that the UI might be a bit confusing with so many buttons and that they're kinda small
Finally Riot have outdone themselves, now I'll need to see if I can continuously spawn in Rivens and Yasuos so I can practise beating them in lane.
